verses.plain: Out of the depths have I cried unto thee, O LORD.

tokens.t: Out of the depths have I cried unto thee, O

verses.plain: Lord, hear my voice: let thine ears be attentive to the voice of my supplications.

tokens.t: Lord, hear my voice: let thine ears be attentive to the voice of my supplications.

verses.plain: If thou, LORD, shouldest mark iniquities, O Lord, who shall stand?

tokens.t: , shouldest mark iniquities, O Lord, who shall stand?

verses.plain: But there is forgiveness with thee, that thou mayest be feared.

tokens.t: forgiveness with thee, that thou mayest be feared.

verses.plain: I wait for the LORD, my soul doth wait, and in his word do I hope.

tokens.t: , my soul doth wait, and in his word do I hope.

verses.plain: My soul waiteth for the Lord more than they that watch for the morning: I say, more than they that watch for the morning.

tokens.t: for the Lord more than they that watch for the morning:
they that watch for the morning.

verses.plain: Let Israel hope in the LORD: for with the LORD there is mercy, and with him is plenteous redemption.
And he shall redeem Israel from all his iniquities.

tokens.t: And he shall redeem Israel from all his iniquities.
